preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: This is reference documentation for all user-configurable parameters in the DocBook XSL Website stylesheets (for generating output from DocBook Website documents).

refnamediv.refpurpose: Toggle <HR> after header

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, an <HR> is generated at the bottom of each web page, before the footer.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Toggle <HR> before footer

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, an <HR> is generated at the bottom of each web page, before the footer.

refnamediv.refpurpose: HREF (URI) for feedback link

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The feedback.href value is used as the value for the href attribute on the feedback link. If feedback.href is empty, no feedback link is generated.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Toggle use of IDs in feedback

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If feedback.with.ids is non-zero, the ID of the current page will be added to the feedback link. This can be used, for example, if the feedback.href is a CGI script.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The text of the feedback link

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The contents of this variable is used as the text of the feedback link if feedback.href is not empty. If feedback.href is empty, no feedback link is generated.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Prefix added to all filenames

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: To produce the text-only (that is, non-tabular) layout of a website simultaneously with the tabular layout, the filenames have to be distinguished. That's accomplished by adding the filename-prefix to the front of each filename.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Identifies the autolayout.xml file

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: When the source pages are spread over several directories, this parameter can be set (for example, from the command line of a batch-mode XSLT processor) to indicate the location of the autolayout.xml file.
FIXME: for browser-based use, there needs to be a PI for this...

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies the root directory of the website

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: When using the XSLT processor to manage dependencies and construct the website, this parameter can be used to indicate the root directory where the resulting pages are placed.
Only applies when XSLT-based chunking is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Indicates that no files should be produced

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: When using the XSLT processor to manage dependencies and construct the website, this parameter can be used to suppress the generation of new and updated files. Effectively, this allows you to see what the stylesheet would do, without actually making any changes.
Only applies when XSLT-based chunking is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Indicates that all files should be produced

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: When using the XSLT processor to manage dependencies and construct the website, this parameter can be used to regenerate the whole website, updating even pages that don't appear to need to be updated.

The dependency extension only looks at the source documents. So if you change something in the stylesheet, for example, that has a global effect, you can use this parameter to force the stylesheet to rebuild the whole website.
Only applies when XSLT-based chunking is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: HTML Table summary attribute value for navigation tables

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The value of this parameter is used as the value of the table summary attribute for the navigation table.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies the width of the navigation table TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The width, in pixels, of the navigation column.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Specifies the width of the navigation table body

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The width of the body column.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The background color of the table body

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The background color of the table body.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The background color of the navigation TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The background color of the navigation TOC.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Use graphic for TOC spacer?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, the indentation in the TOC will be accomplished with the graphic identified by toc.spacer.image.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The text for spacing the TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If toc.spacer.graphic is zero, this text string will be used to indent the TOC.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The image for spacing the TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If toc.spacer.graphic is non-zero, this image will be used to indent the TOC.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Use graphic for TOC pointer?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, the "pointer" in the TOC will be displayed with the graphic identified by toc.pointer.image.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The text for the "pointer" in the TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If toc.pointer.graphic is zero, this text string will be used to display the "pointer" in the TOC.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The image for the "pointer" in the TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If toc.pointer.graphic is non-zero, this image will be used for the "pointer" in the TOC.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Use graphic for "blanks" in TOC?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, "blanks" in the the TOC will be accomplished with the graphic identified by toc.spacer.image.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The text for "blanks" in the TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If toc.blank.graphic is zero, this text string will be used for "blanks" in the TOC.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: The image for "blanks" in the TOC

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If toc.blank.graphic is non-zero, this image will be used to for "blanks" in the TOC.
Only applies with the tabular presentation is being used.

refnamediv.refpurpose: Suppress title on homepage?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FIXME:If non-zero, the title on the homepage is suppressed?

refnamediv.refpurpose: DEPRECATED

refsynopsisdiv.programlisting: <xsl:attribute-set name="body.attributes"> <xsl:attribute name="bgcolor">white</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="text">black</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="link">#0000FF</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="vlink">#840084</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name="alink">#0000FF</xsl:attribute> </xsl:attribute-set>

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: DEPRECATED

refnamediv.refpurpose: Make sequentional links?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FIXME

refnamediv.refpurpose: The text symbol used to mark the current page

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FIXME

refnamediv.refpurpose: Put banner before navigation?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FIXME

refnamediv.refpurpose: Invisible pixel for tabular accessibility

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is the 1x1 pixel, transparent pixel used for the table trick to increase the accessibility of the tabular website presentation.

appendix.title: The Stylesheet
appendix.para: The param.xsl stylesheet is just a wrapper around all these parameters.
appendix.programlisting:
<!-- This file is generated from param.xweb; do not edit this file! -->
<xsl:stylesheet exclude-result-prefixes="src" version="1.0">
<!-- ******************************************************************** $Id: param.xweb 4971 2005-06-28 12:33:37Z xmldoc $ ********************************************************************
This file is part of the DocBook XSL Stylesheets distribution. See ../README or http://docbook.sf.net/release/xsl/current/ for copyright and other information.
******************************************************************** -->
<src:fragref linkend="autolayout-file.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="header.hr.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="footer.hr.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="feedback.href.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="feedback.with.ids.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="feedback.link.text.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="filename-prefix.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="output-root.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="dry-run.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="rebuild-all.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="nav.table.summary.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="navtocwidth.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="navbodywidth.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="textbgcolor.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="navbgcolor.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.spacer.graphic.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.spacer.text.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.spacer.image.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.pointer.graphic.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.pointer.textfrag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.pointer.image.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.blank.graphic.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.blank.text.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="toc.blank.image.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="suppress.homepage.title.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="body.attributes.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="sequential.links.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="currentpage.marker.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="banner.before.navigation.frag"></src:fragref> <src:fragref linkend="table.spacer.image.frag"></src:fragref>
</xsl:stylesheet>
